summary: "Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind" is a 1984 Japanese animated film set in a future world after a nuclear disaster. It's about a teenage princess, Nausicaä, who tries to stop a war between her peaceful valley and an empire that wants to destroy a jungle of giant insects. The movie is based on a manga by Hayao Miyazaki, who also directed it. It's known for its great story, beautiful animation, and strong messages about nature and peace. An early, edited version had problems, but a better one was released in 2005.
title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (film)
